mapper.insert: insert into grouby_item(group_id, spot_id, reg_id, contents, reg_date, mod_date) values (#{groupId}, #{spotId}, #{regId}, #{contents}, current_timestamp(), current_timestamp())
mapper.select: select item.*, (select count(*) from grouby_heart heart where heart.item_id = item.item_id) heart, ifnull((select true from grouby_heart heart where heart.item_id = item.item_id and heart.reg_id = #{regId}), false) heart_press from grouby_item item where item.group_id = #{groupId} and item.spot_id = #{spotId}
